turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Buddy. I need to ask you to do something for me this morning.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, what that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you go on-line and order a coffee for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. Who did you want the coffee from.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like try "Peet's". The one located at 10150 NE Cornell Road in Hillsboro.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What should I order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I've heard a lot about their "Golden Caffe Latte" so go ahead and order that for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, what size, large?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just a medium. Make sure it doesn't have whip cream. Just the milk foam on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, definitely use whole milk. I know it's more calories but you only live once, right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I agree. When did you want to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: In about 30 minutes. I'm heading out the door now and that's about how long it'll take before I get there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Let me double check. You want the Golden Caffe Latte, medium size, no whip cream and you'll be there in about 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's all correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. It should be there ready for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool. Thanks for your help. Go ahead and order one for yourself if you'd like, on me. I'll bring it in to work when I come.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks I'll see you a little later.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, see you later.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye.
